about_the_game:
TSW Compatible content released for a previous Train Sim World® - features may remain unchanged from the original release and may not make use of all newer core features.

Tackle the harsh and mountainous grades of California in a modern masterpiece; experience heavy freight hauling aboard electro-motive power with an orange twist, battle the summit with Train Sim World®: BNSF SD70ACe!

4300 horsepower awaits with BNSF’s fleet of EMD SD70ACe locomotives, which work in tandem alongside GE power such as the ES44C4, on mainline freight duties across their whole network. The SD70ACe was the 5th iteration of Electro-Motive’s SD70 line-up, boasting new emission standards and a revised nose design.

BNSF took ownership of 640 SD70ACe locomotives in total, making them the most prolific owner of the type, and therefore it is a common sight for railfans. The iconic orange and black flashes of these hard-working stallions make for a bold contrast with the brilliant Californian skies and rugged, desert-coated mountains.

Rock up to the base of the Cajon Pass in Train Sim World® and get ready for the climb in an alternative form of motive power. Manage your speed and keep your wit on manifest freight now with Centerbeams in-tow, and move container freight on wheels, on wheels, with the classic Truck Trailer flatbed cars.

Please Note: For the full experience, we recommend you own Train Sim World®: Cajon Pass which is available as a separate purchase.

Key Features


  • SD70ACe diesel locomotive in BNSF livery
  • Inlcudes Centerbeam cars in multiple colours, and a Truck Trailer flat bed car
  • Highly detailed, feature-rich, driving cabs
  • True-to-life performance and handling
  • Accessible Tutorials on the Training Center
  • Includes 3 scenarios and is operable in the Timetable for Cajon Pass
  • Journey Mode tying together Training, Scenarios and Timetabled Services
  • Livery Designer and Scenario Planner compatible. Share your creations with the Creators Club
  • Powered by Dovetail Games’ proprietary SimuGraph® vehicle dynamics engine and Unreal Engine 4® technology
  • Download Size: 243.5 MB

BNSF took ownership of 640 SD70ACe locomotives in total, making them the most prolific owner of the type, and therefore it is a common sight for railfans.
